a valve começou um imperio mercenario nesse jogo, separando os hacks do jogo dela por "quem pode" e "quem n pode" pagar pelo prime a parte q custa mais que o dobro do valor do jogo na epoca q ele era pago.
O jogo eh infestado de hacks, n da pra jogar uma partida direito sem se estressar com esse jogo por causa disso. Ao inves deles melhorarem o jogo, o anticheat e deixar todos felizes, melhorar o jogo dela, nao, a valve prefere ganhar 60 conto por cabeça para poha nenhuma, e te dar a ilusao de q vc ta caindo contra legits

Deathmatch is the best game mode for me. Hopefully this can be used for practising so you can get good at the game especially in the casual game mode, which I'm trash at

This game is fun but if you play with randoms you are just rolling dice to see if you got the good players or the enemy team did. No matter how hard you try you can't win all on your own and some games your team mates will be next to useless. If you want to win and take this game seriously you need at least one other person to join you in your ranked matches otherwise its a fun game to mess around in and talk to strangers, it's way more focused than some games because with only 5 players to a team even one missing player means you are  losing 20% of your combat ability.

Still, it's well balanced and very fun with servers that connect you to other people in a timely manner and I enjoy watching other people lose their minds over a video game so it gets a solid 4/5 stars. Very repetitive but that's sort of the point is to learn and master the maps and more subtle parts of gameplay.
